name: Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos
overview: The Ninja Ryu is back to avenge the death of his father, and stop the Evil Ashtar. A year has passed since Ryu last faced his arch enemy, and still the activity down at the bottom of the realm of darkness continues. Ashtar, the evil lord who secretly controls Jaquio, is again on the move, and it is up to Ryu, the "Ninja Dragon" to put a stop to it. Use all the secrets of real Ninjitsu, along with the exiting audio and special effects and be drawn into the fantasy world of...NINJA GAIDEN II The Dark Sword of Chaos
